page.title: 17CHEMICALS WALKERBURN
page.content: {Rathburn Chemicals}opened in 1972,was founded by Dr.Angus Mackay.There is a small workforce.Most chemicals used, are oil based.Materials of the best possible quality are obtained,treated in a variety of ways and finally distilled.In some of the chemicals used,impurities in 1 ml, must be kept at less than one part per million.They use quantities of distilled water which they make.We saw the process of distillation.They purify solvent for analytical chemists and supply material used in protein analysis chemistry which is one of the areas being intensively investigated in cancer research laboratories all over the world.They export to U.S.A. Scandinavia ,France ,Germany ,Austria Switzerland ,Finland and to many other countries.They use polystyrene for packing for export due to its weight.
